org.codice.ddf.admin.application.service

Interface ApplicationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationServiceImpl

    public interface ApplicationService
    Service that keeps track and obtains status for applications running in the system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addApplication(URI applicationURL)
      Adds a new application to the application list.
      List<FeatureDetails> findApplicationFeatures(String applicationName)
      Returns List of FeatureDtos with repository and status information by Application

      Determine which application contains a certain feature.
      List<FeatureDetails> getAllFeatures()
      Returns List of FeatureDtos with repository and status information

      Returns the application that has the given name

      Retrieve a set of applications are currently installed in the system.

      Retrieve the status for the given application.

    • Method Detail

      • getApplications

        Set<Application> getApplications()
        Retrieve a set of applications are currently installed in the system.
        Returns:
        Set of applications.

      • getApplication

        Application getApplication(String applicationName)
        Returns the application that has the given name
        Parameters:
        applicationName - Name of the application to retrieve. Is case-insensitive.
        Returns:
        The application that matches the name or null if no application matched.

      • isApplicationStarted

        boolean isApplicationStarted(Application application)
        Determine if an application is currently started.
        Parameters:
        application - Application to check if started.
        Returns:
        true if application is ACTIVE, false if it is FAILED, INACTIVE, or UNKNOWN.
        See Also:
        ApplicationStatus.ApplicationState

      • startApplication

        void startApplication(Application application)
               throws ApplicationServiceException
        Starts an application, including any defined dependencies in the application.
        Parameters:
        application - Application instance to start.
        Throws:
        ApplicationServiceException - If the application cannot start due to an error, the exception will be thrown with the error message.

      • startApplication

        void startApplication(String application)
               throws ApplicationServiceException
        Starts an application, including any defined dependencies in the application.
        Parameters:
        application - Name of the application to start.
        Throws:
        ApplicationServiceException - If the application cannot start due to an error, the exception will be thrown with the error message.

      • stopApplication

        void stopApplication(Application application)
              throws ApplicationServiceException
        Stops an application, does not include any external transitive dependencies as they may be needed by other applications.
        Parameters:
        application - Application instance to stop.
        Throws:
        ApplicationServiceException - If the application cannot stop due to an error (or it is not started), the exception will be thrown with the error message.

      • stopApplication

        void stopApplication(String application)
              throws ApplicationServiceException
        Stops an application, does not include any external transitive dependencies as they may be needed by other applications.
        Parameters:
        application - Name of the application to stop.
        Throws:
        ApplicationServiceException - If the application cannot stop due to an error (or it is not started), the exception will be thrown with the error message.

      • addApplication

        void addApplication(URI applicationURL)
             throws ApplicationServiceException
        Adds a new application to the application list.

        NOTE: This does NOT start the application
        Parameters:
        applicationURL - URL location of the application. Currently must be a features repository.
        Throws:
        ApplicationServiceException - If there is an error trying to add the application.

      • removeApplication

        void removeApplication(URI applicationURL)
                throws ApplicationServiceException
        Removes an application that has the given URI.
        Parameters:
        applicationURL - URL location of the application. Currently must be a features repository.
        Throws:
        ApplicationServiceException - If there is an error trying to remove the application.

      • removeApplication

        void removeApplication(Application application)
                throws ApplicationServiceException
        Removes the given application.
        Parameters:
        application - Application instance to remove.
        Throws:
        ApplicationServiceException - If there is an error trying to remove the application.

      • removeApplication

        void removeApplication(String applicationName)
                throws ApplicationServiceException
        Removes an application that has the given name.
        Parameters:
        applicationName - Name of the application to remove.
        Throws:
        ApplicationServiceException - If there is an error trying to remove the application.

      • getApplicationStatus

        ApplicationStatus getApplicationStatus(Application application)
        Retrieve the status for the given application.
        Parameters:
        application - Application to obtain status for.
        Returns:
        Status for the application.

      • getApplicationTree

        Set<ApplicationNode> getApplicationTree()
        Creates a hierarchy tree of application nodes that show the relationship between applications.
        Returns:
        set of the root application nodes that will contain all other applications as their children.

      • findFeature

        Application findFeature(org.apache.karaf.features.Feature feature)
        Determine which application contains a certain feature.
        Parameters:
        feature - The feature to search for.
        Returns:
        The application which contains that feature.

      • getInstallationProfiles

        List<org.apache.karaf.features.Feature> getInstallationProfiles()
        Gets the application Profile features on the system.
        Returns:
        the inatllation profiles.

        List<FeatureDetails> getAllFeatures()
        Returns List of FeatureDtos with repository and status information
        Returns:
